frameDefinitions: An Agent manipulates an Instrument in order to achieve a Purpose.
An Arguer presents a Content, along with Support, to an Addressee.
An Agent, Actor, Entity, or Medium causes a Phenomenon to be perceived by a Perceiver.
A  Counter_actor or Cause  impedes an Agent in an Activity or impedes the unfolding or continuation of a State_of_affairs.

Some Possessor, either a nation, institution, or private individual, controls a Force whose primary functions to defend the Possessor (or, in the case of an institution or individual, some area of land significant to them) and to carry out offensive actions for the Possessor.
A Speaker mentions a Specified_entity filling a Role, thereby providing information which supports a point of the Speaker.
frameExamples: For cold conditions, we recommend that you <t>use</t> a heat gun or a hair dryer to make the adhesive work better.
Jan <t>argued</t> that the evidence was inadmissable.

However, as this story goes on the Queen of Sodom has a brother who
plans to <t>undermine</t> his sister and take the throne of Sodom.
He cites the chief original observations <t>adduced</t> by Darwin as evidence for his theory.
listRoleDefinitions: The Agent uses the Instrument to achieve their Purpose.
This role identifies the purpose for which an Agent uses the Instrument.
An entity directed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that serves to bring about the <fen>Purpose</fen> of the <fen>Agent</fen>.
An <fen>Instrument</fen> that has a function associated with it.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> uses the <fen>Instrument</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the Agent uses the Instrument.

The <fen>Arguer</fen> wants the <fen>Addressee</fen> to entertain the <fen>Content</fen>, which can be a proposition to be believed or a course of action to be taken, based on the <fen>Support</fen> presented.
The <fen>Arguer</fen> presents the <fen>Content</fen> before the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
The Time at which an <fen>Arguer</fen> makes an argument for the <fen>Content</fen>.
This role identifies the location where an argument is made by an <fen>Arguer</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally creates a situation in which the <fen>Perceiver</fen> observes or experiences the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is an entity or idea that is perceived by the <fen>Perceiver</fen>.
The <fen>Perceiver</fen> is made to have a perceptual experience by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
An <fen>Actor</fen> is a sentient being who is exhibiting, possibly uninintentionally, some <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
An object that has some association with a <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Medium</fen> through which a <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is expressed.
When the event occurs.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> causes the perception of the <fen>Perceiver</fen>.
An event or state_of_Affairs that successfully impedes an <fen>Agent</fen> or a State_of_affairs.
A person who intentionally or not acts in such a way that an <fen>Agent</fen> or State_of_affairs is impeded.
A person who is intentionally engaged in some <fen>Activity</fen> and who is impeded in that <fen>Activity</fen>.
An <fen>Activity</fen> that is being impeded.
A state or event that is ongoing and whose continuance or unfolding is impeded.
The time at which the <fen>Counter_actor</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> works agains the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Counter_actor</fen> subverts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Force</fen> is the body of soldiers that acts in military capacity for the <fen>Possessor</fen>. This role is incorporated in each word in this frame.
The <fen>Possessor</fen> is the nation, institution, or individual who possesses and/or controls the <fen>Force</fen>.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who specifies the <fen>Role</fen> to be filled by the <fen>Specified_entity</fen>.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies as filling a particular <fen>Role</fen>.
A slot in a particular or generic event or relation whose filler the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies.
The time when the statement is made.
The role specifies the place where the statement takes place.
listRoleExamples: For cold conditions, we recommend using <fex>a heat gun or a hair dryer</fex> to make the adhesive work better.
Mirabella shared the mischievous vision of childlike exuberance and used the chair <fex>as a pseudo jungle gym</fex>.
I went and used that ball <fex>yesterday</fex> and i bowled 5 games and i left about 14 ten pins with it.
Jan argued <fex>that the evidence was inadmissable</fex>.
<fex>Jan</fex> argued that the evidence was inadmissable.
The government argued <fex>in August</fex> that the prisoners should not be released
The young men will be arguing their policies <fex>in the school auditorium</fex>.
Tory rebels queued to warn that <fex>they</fex> wouldsabotage efforts to put the treaty through Parliament .
If he is really undermining <fex>me</fex>, then he is a fine friend.
The Dominican Republic was widely held to have undermined <fex>its own efforts to become a full member of CARICOM</fex>
Whenever I try to quit they all try to sabotage <fex>my efforts</fex>.
The American invasion, which drew 26000 American troops against <fex>General Noriega's</fex> army, was the largest US military operation since Vietnam.
But<fex>Arturo Boncato Jr., marketing manager of the Marco Polo Hotel,</fex> cited the high occupancy rates in the hotels as proof of increasing visitors' confidence.
<fex>In a subsequent paper</fex> he adduced further evidence.

Reilly pointed <fex>to the high labor costs</fex> as the
main reason for the decision to close down the New Orleans facility.
TCI named the overly expensive bid price <fex>as the main reason for their strict opposition against a merger</fex>.

Persistent, heavy rainfall and poorly maintained drainage systems were cited
<fex>yesterday</fex> as the prime causes for the rising floodwaters
<fex>In Kuala Lumpur</fex>, he also pointed to the accountability/assessment arena as a place for new businesses to investigate.
